description_en: sustainability and eco-friendly options for bridal and formal wear.
description_zh: 婚纱与正式礼服可持续性与环保选项。

attributes.description_en: Cotton grown without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, creating a sustainable option.
attributes.description_zh: 不使用合成杀虫剂或肥料种植的棉花，营造可持续选择。

attributes.description_en: Polyester made from recycled plastic bottles, creating a sustainable option.
attributes.description_zh: 由再生塑料瓶制成的聚酯，营造可持续选择。

attributes.description_en: Eco-friendly regenerated fiber made from wood pulp, creating a sustainable option.
attributes.description_zh: 由木浆制成的环保再生纤维，营造可持续选择。

attributes.description_en: Natural fiber from hemp plants, creating a sustainable and durable option.
attributes.description_zh: 来自大麻植物的天然纤维，营造可持续耐用选择。

attributes.description_en: Natural fiber from flax plants, creating a sustainable and breathable option.
attributes.description_zh: 来自亚麻植物的天然纤维，营造可持续透气选择。

attributes.description_en: Natural fiber from bamboo plants, creating a sustainable and soft option.
attributes.description_zh: 来自竹子植物的天然纤维，营造可持续柔软选择。

attributes.description_en: Natural fiber from sheep, creating a sustainable and warm option.
attributes.description_zh: 来自绵羊的天然纤维，营造可持续保暖选择。

attributes.description_en: Natural fiber from silkworms, creating a sustainable and luxurious option.
attributes.description_zh: 来自蚕的天然纤维，营造可持续奢华选择。

attributes.description_en: Natural material from cork oak trees, creating a sustainable and unique option.
attributes.description_zh: 来自软木橡树的天然材料，营造可持续独特选择。

attributes.description_en: Natural fiber from coconut husks, creating a sustainable and durable option.
attributes.description_zh: 来自椰子壳的天然纤维，营造可持续耐用选择。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with uneven or off-center design elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有不均匀或偏心设计元素的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with sheer fabric or mesh overlay.
attributes.description_zh: 带有透明面料或网纱覆盖的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with decorative cutouts or openings.
attributes.description_zh: 带有装饰性镂空或开口的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with soft, draped fabric.
attributes.description_zh: 带有柔软垂坠面料的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with multiple layers or tiers.
attributes.description_zh: 带有多层或分层的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with gathered or pleated fabric.
attributes.description_zh: 带有收褶或打褶面料的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with belt or sash elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有腰带或饰带元素的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options that wrap around the body.
attributes.description_zh: 包裹身体的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options with short overskirt or ruffle elements.
attributes.description_zh: 带有短罩裙或荷叶边元素的可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Clean, simple sustainability options with minimal details.
attributes.description_zh: 简洁干净的可持续性选项，细节最少。

attributes.description_en: Structured, geometric sustainability options with sharp lines.
attributes.description_zh: 结构化几何可持续性选项，线条锐利。

attributes.description_en: Non-traditional sustainability options with unconventional construction.
attributes.description_zh: 非传统可持续性选项，带有非常规结构。

attributes.description_en: One-of-a-kind sustainability options created through advanced techniques.
attributes.description_zh: 通过高级技术创造的独一无二可持续性选项。

attributes.description_en: Sustainability options that can be altered or adjusted.
attributes.description_zh: 可改变或调整的可持续性选项。
